str2: For. A primary particle; properly, assigning a reason.

parse: Personal / Possessive Pronoun - Genitive 1st Person Plural
str2: I, the first-person pronoun. A primary pronoun of the first person I.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.

parse: Verb - Present Participle Active - Nominative Neuter Singular
str2: To use up, spend, consume (as with fire). From kata and analisko; to consume utterly.
Fire; the heat of the sun, lightning; fig: strife, trials; the eternal fire. A primary word; 'fire'.
